author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Evoke Pharma Posts Loss Of $0.13 Per Share in Q1
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Evoke Pharma Inc:
* EVOKE PHARMA REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS AND HIGHLIGHTS
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.13 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.19 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* NDA SUBMISSION FOR GIMOT ON TRACK FOR Q2 OF 2018 * INCLUDED IN NET LOSS FOR Q1 WAS A GAIN OF ABOUT $433,000 DUE TO CHANGE IN FAIR VALUE OF WARRANT LIABILITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
